column2: ![t i t l e l e n g t h c h a n g e s a p p e a r a n c e i n o u t p u t p d f](images/bitfields/register3.png)
**When Read** : Reads each pin's Input/Output conditions:
1 = the pin is set to output
0 = the pin is set to input with internal pullup
**When Write** : Sets each pin's Input/Output configurations:
1: sets the pin to an Output. output level is set by
0: sets the pin to an Input with internal pull-up connected
